REME_HandOfSuture.NAME: Hand Of Suture
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat,add a Suture card of two copies from a random card into your hand.It cost #b1 this turn.

REME_GreatPipe.NAME: 了不起的烟斗
DESCRIPTIONS: 在你的回合结束时， #r尽可能 作出一项满足你需求的行动。

REME_ClumsyBirds.NAME: 笨鸟
DESCRIPTIONS: 在你的回合开始时，你手牌每有一张 固有 牌，抽一张牌。

REME_MegaHouse.NAME: 大屋子
REME_MegaHouse.FLAVOR: “一项近乎完美的放大化工程。这是我至今第二优秀的作品，但仍然远远不够。”——建筑师
DESCRIPTIONS: 在你的回合开始时，将一张 #b大屋子 牌加入你的手牌。 NL 大屋子可以存储卡牌。
NL 本次战斗存的牌：

REME_Singularity.NAME: 奇点
REME_Singularity.FLAVOR: 无限小且不实际存在的“点”
DESCRIPTIONS: 拾取时，从 #b20 张牌中选择任意张，之后 #r不会再出现 在 #y商店 和 #y卡牌奖励 。（每个稀有度至少保留3张）
选择任意张，之后你不会遇到它们
你移除的卡：

REME_ComplimentaryCards.NAME: Complimentary Cards
REME_ComplimentaryCards.FLAVOR: Start with a card, the rest picking up.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yRight #yClick this relic to choose #b1 card from #b5 cards,then become invalid.
Ensure Good Game

REME_BillBoard.NAME: 公告栏
DESCRIPTIONS: 每场战斗开始时，发布一个随机任务。完成可以获得 #y不错 的奖励。
获得累计
点格挡：
造成累计
点伤害：
打出累计
张牌：

REME_Truck.NAME: 卡车
DESCRIPTIONS: 你可以像RPG主角一样升级。怪物也可以。

REME_DuelDisc.NAME: Duel Disc
DESCRIPTIONS: #yRetain your hand at the end of turn.Draw #b8 cards when combat start,but draw #b3 cards each turn.

REME_PuzzleBoxRelic.NAME: Puzzle Box
DESCRIPTIONS: Play a random card at the start of your turn.

REME_VIPCard.NAME: 贵宾卡
REME_VIPCard.FLAVOR: 首充100送200！只有本店最尊贵的客人，才有机会获得哦！
DESCRIPTIONS: 你能在商店获得更豪华的服务！
(无限删卡，商店右击可以治疗或抽奖)

REME_LimitBreaker.NAME: LimitBreaker
DESCRIPTIONS: #yBlock , #yStrength and #yDexterity can break through #b999 .

REME_DemonsWealth.NAME: Demon`s Wealth
DESCRIPTIONS: Add #b1 #rCurse into your combat rewards.Whenever you gain #rCurse,gain #b200 #yGold.

REME_CardOfGreed.NAME: Card Of Greed
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw #b1 card when you play one card for every #b10 cards in your deck.

REME_CardOfGluttony.NAME: Card Of Gluttony
DESCRIPTIONS: When draw,draw #b1 extra.

REME_HourglassOfDeath.NAME: Hourglass Of Death
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal #b1 damage to ALL enemies for each second them waste in their turn.

REME_OnlineShoppingPlatform.NAME: Online Shopping APP
DESCRIPTIONS: Your potion slots will always be #yFULL,but pay #b20 #yGold when you use potions.

REME_BlueBull.NAME: 蓝牛
DESCRIPTIONS: 你在每场战斗中的第一张技能牌获得的 #y格挡 提高 #b8 点。

REME_ArchaeologicalTools.NAME: Archaeological Tools
REME_ArchaeologicalTools.FLAVOR: As an archaeologist, he must have certain physical quality.
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards unused after you equip this relic cost 0 and gain #b3 #yGold when played.

REME_LowDesire.NAME: Low Desire
REME_LowDesire.FLAVOR: Just want to live a peaceful life.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, obtain #b2 common relics.Add #b1 #yColorless into your combat rewards.
Just in peace...
Skip Rewards
Close

REME_IWantAll.NAME: I Want All
DESCRIPTIONS: You can choose to obtain #yALL cards in cards rewards,and gain #b1 Max HP for each.

REME_ChargedStone.NAME: Charged Stone
REME_ChargedStone.FLAVOR: You become eager to be beaten with this relic.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose HP,gain [E] next turn.

REME_PoisonedDagger.NAME: PoisonedDagger
REME_PoisonedDagger.FLAVOR: This is a very poisonous Dagger(licking)
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you use a potion,add one #yShiv into your hand.
